Package org.autogui.swing.util

Interface PopupExtension.PopupMenuBuilder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:

    Enclosing class:
    PopupExtension
    public static interface PopupExtension.PopupMenuBuilder
    the interface for constructing menus

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void build​(PopupExtension.PopupMenuFilter filter, Consumer<Object> menu)
      the Consumer accepts Action including JMenu and JPopupMenu JMenuItem JComponent
      default void buildWithClear​(PopupExtension.PopupMenuFilter filter, JPopupMenu menu)

        the Consumer accepts
        • Action including JMenu and JPopupMenu

        Parameters:

      • buildWithClear

        default void buildWithClear​(PopupExtension.PopupMenuFilter filter,
                            JPopupMenu menu)
        the default behavior reconstruct entire items by build(PopupExtension.PopupMenuFilter, Consumer). The Consumer can append an item to the menu.
        Parameters:
        filter - an item filter
        menu - the target for appending menus
